title.English:
We very much hope you enjoyed your recent experience at Hotel X
It is important to us that you love being here as much as we do and for that reason we ask if you could spare a couple of minutes to complete this short hotel guest experience survey.
Privacy is important to us and your comments will be kept confidential and will only be used in relation to this short survey.
We look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel X.
Yours sincerely
Joe Bloggs
Director
Hotel X
www.hotelx.co.uk
How did you hear about us?
Why did you stay with us?
Please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement with the follow statements
Do you have any other comments regarding your arrival?
Please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement with the follow statements
Do you have any other comments regarding your bedroom/suite?
Do you have any other comments regarding Hotel X as a dining venue?
Please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement with the follow statements
As a conference and events venue
Do you have any other comments regarding Hotel X as a conference or events venue?
Please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement with the follow statements
Was there any particular member of the team you would like to acknowledge and why?
Please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement with the follow statements
How did your experience with us meet with your expectations?
Was there anything else that we could have done to enhance your overall experience?
Do you have any further comments?
It is very important to us to minimise our impact on the environment. Do you have any ideas or changes we could make so that we can be greener as a business?
Which of the following ranges includes your age?
Would you like to receive any further information from Hotel X regarding?
If you do not want us to publish your review online...

English.center:
Thank you for your time and invaluable feedback.
Please click on "Submit" to complete your response to this survey.

title.English:
Thank you for your time and assistance in completing this survey, your feedback is invaluable as we continually strive to improve our services.
If we can be of any assistance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.
If you would also like to share your recent Hotel X experience with the world please click here to submit to tripadvisor
Joe Bloggs Director Hotel X www.hotelx.co.uk
